channel.title: Ok this is a really weird bug!
channel.description: uhm i did something in project 16 v6 now, and the monsters only got like 1k hp, but they hit like 70, and when they have 2k hp 99, i need to set it normal again! help!?!?!?!?!?!?!

item.title: Ok this is a really weird bug!
item.dc:creator: @mwill14 mwill14
item.description:
@mwill14 wrote:

well if u edited something in npc handler, just extract the source again (u might have to rename it since u cannot have 2 folders with the same name) and take the npc handler from it and delete the other one and put that one in its place since it would be the same thing before u edited it, because its the same source

Read full topic

item.description:
@junkyNL wrote:

well thats the point of this

(before) 3k hp hit 40

(now) 3k hp hit 99 :eek: :eek:

(before) 1k hp hit 20

(now) 1k hp hit 70’s
